Class AmbientLight

java.lang.Object
lighting.AmbientLight
public class AmbientLight extends Object
AmbientLight class represents the ambient light in a scene. It is a type of light that is present in the scene and illuminates all objects equally. The intensity of the ambient light can be adjusted.
